instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: ISL question
threads.message:
ISL6259 recives 20V and vdd at 5V. But pin 14 ACOK is 0.50V.
PPBUS is 0.50V too and no short to ground.
17,18 and 27,28 measure ok.
Anything more to check before replace isl6259?

Board was liquide damage but comes to me completly cleaned. No green light.

threads.title: ISL question
threads.message: ISL seems dead to me, but very limited info.

threads.title: ISL question
threads.message: What more should I measure? Need more pins?

threads.title: ISL question
threads.message: Well, I replaced ISL but still PPBUS at 0V and acok at 0.30V

threads.title: ISL question
threads.message: R7005 resistance is what? What is the resistance to ground on PPBUS_G3H? What voltage is on CHGR_ACIN pin of 6259?

threads.title: ISL question
threads.message:
Board is 820-4924

acin - 4.90V
R7105 - 20ohm
ppbus - .0L and .170 in diode mode.
ppbus - 1V
CHGR_DCIN - 20V

threads.title: ISL question
threads.message: If pin 2 receives 16V+ and ACIN is 4.9V, ACOK should come high at least. Measurement on PPBUS is also worryingly low. What is resistance to GND on PPBUS?
